The strongest winds will be above 2,500 feet elevation. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County.

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 1:52PM MST until November 29 at 6:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow continuing. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches. Amounts up to 18 inches possible above 9500 feet. * WHERE...Sierra Madre and Snowy Mountain Ranges. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening.

entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued November 29 at 1:52PM MST until November 30 at 6:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Laramie Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Wednesday.

entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued November 29 at 1:52PM MST until November 30 at 2:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...GROUND BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions developing. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph.

entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued November 29 at 1:52PM MST until November 30 at 2:00PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...GROUND BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Ground blizzard conditions developing. Wind gusts up to 60 MPH. Dangerous wind chills as low as 25 degrees below zero. * WHERE...South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 PM MST Wednesday.
